書き出す: (かきだす) - to begin to write; to write out; to export (file); to extract
書き分ける: (かきわける) - (書き分ける only) to distinguish in writing/to use different writing styles; (usu. 描き分ける) to draw (identifiably)
書き初め: (かきぞめ) - first calligraphy of the year
書き判: (かきはん) - signature or written seal at the end of a document
書き割: (かきわり) - portable painting used as part of the backdrop (in kabuki, etc.)
書き割り: (かきわり) - portable painting used as part of the backdrop (in kabuki, etc.)
書き加える: (かきくわえる) - to add (e.g. a postscript)
書き取り: (かきとり) - writing down from other written material/writing kanji text from hiragana; transcription (of spoken material)
書き取る: (かきとる) - to write down; to take dictation; to take notes
書き味: (かきあじ) - the feel or performance of a pen
書き変え: (かきかえ) - rewriting (book); renewal; transfer of ownership
書き始める: (かきはじめる) - (esp. 書き始める) to begin to write/to begin writing; (esp. 描き始める) to begin to draw/to begin drawing/to begin painting
書き尽くす: (かきつくす) - to write down or convey in full
書き尽す: (かきつくす) - to write down or convey in full
書き延ばす: (かきのばす) - to make text longer by additional writing
書き役: (かきやく) - clerk; secretary; scribe; copyist
書き抜く: (かきぬく) - to extract (e.g. a passage from a book); to make an excerpt
書き振り: (かきぶり) - style or manner of writing
書き捨てる: (かきすてる) - to write and throw away; to write carelessly; to begin writing then stop part-way through
書き捲くる: (かきまくる) - to dash off; to write freely
書き捲る: (かきまくる) - to dash off; to write freely
書き換え: (かきかえ) - rewriting (book); renewal; transfer of ownership
書き換える: (かきかえる) - to rewrite; to overwrite; to renew; to transfer
書き換え可能: (かきかえかのう) - rewritable (e.g. magneto-optical CD)
書き損ない: (かきそこない) - slip of the pen; miswriting; mistake in writing
書き改める: (かきあらためる) - to rewrite; to adapt (e.g. a novel)
書き散らす: (かきちらす) - to scribble; to scrawl
書き方: (かきかた) - way of writing/manner of writing; penmanship (esp. used in old textbooks)/calligraphy; format (e.g. of a report); stroke order of a character
書き替え: (かきかえ) - rewriting (book); renewal; transfer of ownership
書き替える: (かきかえる) - to rewrite; to overwrite; to renew; to transfer
書き止める: (かきとめる) - to write down; to leave a note behind; to record; to chronicle
書き残す: (かきのこす) - to leave a note or document behind; to leave half-written; to leave out
書き殴る: (かきなぐる) - to scribble (write quickly); to dash off
書き添える: (かきそえる) - to add; to write a postscript
書き漏らす: (かきもらす) - to leave out; to forget to write
書き留め: (かきとめ) - registered mail; registration (e.g. of mail)/writing down/putting on record/recording/making a note of
書き留める: (かきとどめる) - to write down; to leave a note behind; to record; to chronicle
書き直し: (かきなおし) - rewriting; rewrite; fair copy
書き直す: (かきなおす) - to write out; to make a fair copy; to rewrite
書き立てる: (かきたてる) - to write (a person) up (in a positive or negative light); to write something up so that it stands out; to write up in an exaggerated fashion; to detail; to list
書き続ける: (かきつづける) - to continue writing
書き綴る: (かきつづる) - to put into written form; to communicate or express by writing; to chronicle
書き置き: (かきおき) - note (letter) left behind; will
書き落す: (かきおとす) - to leave out; to forget to write
書き落とす: (かきおとす) - to forget to write something; to leave something out; to omit something
書き著す: (かきあらわす) - to publish (a book)
書き表す: (かきあらわす) - to write out/to express/to describe; to publish
書き表わす: (かきあらわす) - to write out/to express/to describe; to publish
書き言葉: (かきことば) - written word; written language
書き記す: (かきしるす) - to write down; to record; to register
書き起こし: (かきおこし) - opening words or sentence
書き起す: (かきおこす) - to begin (book, letter, etc.) with
書き足す: (かきたす) - to add to; to insert
書き込み: (kakikomi) - writing; entry (por exemplo, para um formulário) , writing; entry (e.g. to a form); posting (e.g. to a blog)
書き込み保護スイッチ: (かきこみほごスイッチ) - write protection switch
書き込み可能: (かきこみかのう) - writable (e.g. a writable CD-ROM)
書き込む: (かきこむ) - to fill in (field, entry, etc.)/to fill out (form); to post a message (e.g. on a bulletin-board); to store
書き連ねる: (かきつらねる) - to make a list; to enumerate
書き間違い: (かきまちがい) - slip of the pen; mistake in writing; misspelling; lapsus calami
書き間違える: (かきまちがえる) - to write incorrectly (e.g. character); to make a mistake in writing
書き難い: (かきにくい) - difficult to write or draw; does not write well (pen, brush, etc.)
書の旨い人: (しょのうまいひと) - excellent calligrapher
書中: (しょちゅう) - contained in a letter
書丹: (しょたん) - writing an inscription on a stone monument (e.g. before carving it)
書付: (かきつけ) - paper; note; document; bill
書体: (しょたい) - calligraphic style; calligraphic styles; typeface
書入れ時: (かきいれどき) - busy business period; time of greatest profits
書出し: (かきだし) - beginning (of writing)/opening passage (sentence, paragraph, etc.); written claim/bill
書初: (かきぞめ) - first calligraphy of the year
書初め: (かきぞめ) - first calligraphy of the year
書判: (かきはん) - signature or written seal at the end of a document
書割: (かきわり) - portable painting used as part of the backdrop (in kabuki, etc.)
書取: (かきとり) - writing down from other written material/writing kanji text from hiragana; transcription (of spoken material)
